title: Johnny Sokko and His Flying Robot dvd rip
description:
In this 1960s Japanese live-action sci-fi series, young Johnny Sokko (Mitsunobu Kaneko) commandeers a giant robot designed to be the indestructible weapon of planet Gargoyle's evil emperor and used in the quest to rule Earth. In a heroic bid to save the planet, Johnny uses his sole command of the android to fight the malicious aliens.
